name: Alchem-ish
description:
Congratulations! You have just been hired at “Swamp Valley Apothecary!” The bad news? You lied on your resume. Well? Don’t just stand there! You’ve got potions to make!

You have just been thrust into a job you are unprepared and under-qualified for. In Alchem-ish, you must run an apothecary with no prior experience. You’ll be fine, just act like you belong, and no one will know the difference.

Our submission for the 10th Pirate Software Game Jam. The jam theme was "Nothing is Explained."
